Description: Normal 0 false false false EN-US JA X-NONE Stellar Mercury 001 Elite - Green Forrest Flametop, Singlecut Electric Guitar The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · There is a crack in the clearcoat on the heel of the neck as well as bubbles in the clearcoat on the back of the body. Neither of these cosmetic blemishes affects the playability of this guitar in the slightest! This is one awesome looking guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick flametop maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The flame maple top, as well as the body is stained with a vibrant looking green; a very unique color! The fretboard is rich and dark which also gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar OSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Classic looking guitar! The guitar comes made out of a thick flame maple cap (NOT a veneer!) and mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark brown rosewood fret board. Specs Body: Maple flametop and mahogany body, cream binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, cream binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, cream binding Electronics: x2 Stellar OSR humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, chrome hardware MER001P-GF
Title: Stellar Mercury 001 Premium - Green Forrest Flametop, Singlecut Electric Guitar
